course_title: Family/Emergency Nurse Practitioner III: Traumatic Emergencies
class_notes: Online with synchronous/asynchronous sessions: Zoom. On-campus dates TBD.
course_description: The course focuses on care of patients with traumatic injuries in pre-hospital, urgent care and emergency department settings. Emphasis is on injury control and prevention, legal issues, team communication and emergency department leadership.
prerequisites: NRSG 579 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3024, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 7a-12:50p, Instructor: D. Evans, Status: Open
